title: Drawing, "Seven Studies, Advertisement for Beer", ca. 1936
medium: Graphite, blue crayon on thin paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Sheet of sketches showing five walking men wearing bowler hats, in semi abstraction. Two hold aloft drinking glasses. A spiral in center. Lower right, in light graphite: BEER / IS / REST.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Seven Studies, Advertisement for Beer", ca. 1936.
ca. 1936. Graphite, blue crayon on thin paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-704.
